snippet: It’s bad politics not to address the challenges we face.
abstract: Op-Ed article by former Utah Gov Jon M Huntsman Jr warns that the Republican Party cannot ignore reality of climate change any longer; calls for approach to dealing with climate change consistent with Republican tradition of innovation and problem-solving.
lead_paragraph: It’s bad politics not to address the challenges we face.

headline.main: The G.O.P. Can’t Ignore Climate Change
headline.print_headline: The G.O.P. Can’t Ignore Climate Change
